changes.description: Refactored Homepage into modular components (Header, TechStackCard, ChangelogCard, TagBrowserCard, LogoutButton)
Introduced shared CardWrapper component for consistent layout and styling across cards
Created local inline SVG icons for React, Tailwind, Supabase, and React Router
Added icons folder with individual reusable React components for all tech stack icons
Ensured consistent card sizing and spacing using grid layout with items-stretch
Added changelog entries for today's refactoring and icon updates
Added Browse by Tag feature to filter changelog entries dynamically
Introduced tag-based color system and filtering logic
Refined card layout to maintain consistent height and spacing
Removed Ant Design and replaced with custom Tailwind UI
Modularized form fields for reuse and clarity
